item.title: Impressum
item.author: info@drehwurm.band (Drehwurm)
item.description: Ein paar legale Dinge Angaben gem. ยง 5 TMG: Drehwurm c/o Nico Westerbeck Kolberger Platz 2 14199 Berlin Kontaktaufnahme: E-Mail: #span-572d1c34.cloaked-e-mail:before { content:attr(data-domain) "\0040" attr(data-user); unicode-bidi:bidi-override; direction:rtl; }    var scriptTag = document.getElementById("script-572d1c34"); var link = document.createElement("a"); var address = "retsambew".split('').reverse().join('') + "@" + "dnab.mruwherd".split('').reverse().join(''); link.href = "mailto" + ":" + address; link.innerText = address.split('?')[0]; scriptTag.parentElement.insertBefore(link, scriptTag.previousElementSibling); scriptTag.parentElement.removeChild(scriptTag.previousElementSibling) oder #span-bf182f5e.cloaked-e-mail:before { content:attr(data-domain) "\0040" attr(data-user); unicode-bidi:bidi-override; direction:rtl; }    var scriptTag = document.
